data.name: Car Quest Demo
data.detailed_description:
Buckle-up for an epic road trip through a colorful world of puzzles and adventure.

DEMO: This demo includes approx 30 minutes of the full game
data.about_the_game:
Buckle-up for an epic road trip through a colorful world of puzzles and adventure.

DEMO: This demo includes approx 30 minutes of the full game
data.short_description: Buckle-up for an epic road trip through a colorful world of puzzles and adventure.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
